Can you reformat tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config/BUILD to fix the errors below ?
FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
181c181
< "-Wl,-rpath,../local_config_sycl/sycl/lib"

    "-Wl,-rpath,../local_config_sycl/sycl/lib",

183,184c183,186
< deps = if_ccpp(["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],
< ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"]),

deps = if_ccpp(
    ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],
    ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"],
),

209c211
< )
\ No newline at end of file

)

body:
Can you reformat tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config/BUILD to fix the errors below ?
FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
181c181
<         "-Wl,-rpath,../local_config_sycl/sycl/lib"
---
>         "-Wl,-rpath,../local_config_sycl/sycl/lib",
183,184c183,186
<     deps = if_ccpp(["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],
<                    ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"]),
---
>     deps = if_ccpp(
>         ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],
>         ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"],
>     ),
209c211
< )
\ No newline at end of file
---
> )
